Package com.nickfiorentino.service

Class RestAllItemsService

java.lang.Object
com.nickfiorentino.service.RestAllItemsService
@Component public class RestAllItemsService extends Object
Service class responsible for retrieving item data from Blizzard's World of Warcraft (Classic) API.

This class uses a RestClient to send authorized requests to Blizzard's /data/wow/item/{itemId} endpoint. The service returns item data as a ItemPojo object.

It retrieves and applies a bearer token from RestBlizzardAuthenticationService for authenticated access.

This service is typically used by controllers to fetch detailed item data by ID when building or displaying a WoW character's inventory.

See Also:

  • RestBlizzardAuthenticationService

  • Constructor Details

    • RestAllItemsService

      public RestAllItemsService(RestBlizzardAuthenticationService blizzardAuthentication)
      Constructs a new RestAllItemsService with the given authentication service.

      This constructor fetches a bearer token from Blizzard and initializes the RestClient with the required base URL and authorization headers.

      Parameters:
      blizzardAuthentication - the service used to obtain the bearer token

  • Method Details

    • getItem

      public ItemPojo getItem(int itemId) throws org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException
      Retrieves a single item from Blizzard's WoW API by its unique item ID.

      The request is sent to the /data/wow/item/{itemId} endpoint, and the response is mapped to a ItemPojo.

      Parameters:
      itemId - the unique ID of the item to fetch
      Returns:
      an ItemPojo representing the item's data
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - if the API returns an error (e.g., 404 or 500)
